participant_1.background:
My last vacation was a perfect time to catch up on my reading and learn about new cultures.
I love to travel and experience new places, especially in cold weather.
I take my pets to my lake in the backyard every day and watch them swim as I drink tea.
I like to cook with my mom and we try new recipes every week.
i am really terrible at doing regular expressions.

participant_2.background:
My biggest fear is that my dogs will run off and get lost.
i like field hockey and soccer.
My family loves food of all types, and we are always looking for new places to try.
I love nature documentaries because they make me feel like I'm exploring the wilderness without leaving my couch.
i only buy convertible cars.

content.text: Pretty well so far! Just got back from a vacation in the mountains.
Oh that sounds nice! I've always wanted to go to the mountains.
You should! It's so peaceful and beautiful.
I did a lot of reading and learning about new cultures while I was there. I love to explore new places.
That sounds awesome! I love reading too. I'm trying to learn how to cook with my mom, we try new recipes every week.
That's so great! I love cooking with my mom too, we're always trying new things.
It's so much fun! We're always trying to find new recipes that we all like.
It really is! I love trying new foods and learning about new cultures.
Me too! It's so much fun to explore new things.
It really is! I'm glad we're on the same page.
Me too! I love talking to people who love to explore new things
